attributes.contentHtml: Skie now that is utter bull shit, you q trusted member of the staff team uprooted a server and several things in order to have a larger sence of control over the server. And when I had attempted to persuade bad that your 'events discord' with 'stolen' maps you had banned me as you knew I was a threat to your operation. Now others who have attempted to destroy the host you've only made it stronger our clients are joining together and making each other feel closer towards our host. Finding the ip of those who go against us is a hobby our clients have gained in order to support our host; really we should thank you all for the aid you've given.
